Posts.Content:
You didn't mention, Lifebear, that you were referred to a general practitioner, did you?Â  I would make a request immediately to be sent to a specialist in breast surgery. It's just like having your eyes examined: you woulnd't go to an optical physician if you suspect something seriously wrong with your eyes: you would see an ophthalmologist.
Please do see a breast surgeon in regard to your situation. I found
them informative, helpful, and knowledgeable about
 all aspects that
one needs to know in regard to what's what.
I.G.
Posts.Title: IM 33 YEARS OLD. ULTRASOUND AND MAMMO NOW REFERRED TO A GENERAL SURGEON-CONCERNED HELP!
